ValidationRule.description: Status is automatically updated according to the resolution selected. This VR stops users to change manually status to closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT($User.BypassVR__c),
/* Profiles ICON's or ICONiCS's */ CONTAINS( UPPER($Profile.Name), "ICON"), ISPICKVAL ( Status , "Closed"), OR( ISPICKVAL ( Resolution__c , "Reply to be made by CSC"), ISPICKVAL ( Resolution__c , "Request to Store"), ISPICKVAL ( Resolution__c , "Escalation") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Do not change the status manually, select the resolution and the status will be automatically updated.
